channel.description: eBay news and discussion on how to sell on eBay. We cover topics ranging from finding a good dropshipper, writing proper titles and descriptions, shipping, taking photos, marketing your eBay auction and much more!

item.title: Ebay Auctions Taskforce - Live Event - Podcast #18
item.description:
Tim Knox Live event Scott and Tim talk about their upcoming 'get together' in Huntsville Alabama, November 10th and 11th. Join them. eBay has 100's of millions of buyers and sellers. Are you taking full advantage of this huge, profitable market? Each week Scott Paton and Tim Knox discuss the latest news from the auction capital of the Internet. Whether you are starting out, an experienced Powerseller or just looking to find great deals, eBay Auction Taskforce is your source for success. Length: 29:55

item.title: Ebay Auctions Taskforce - eBay and Stubleupon - Podcast #17
item.description:
eBay recently purchased Stumbleupon.com. The purchase price is reportedly $75 million. Adding StumbleUpon to other Ebay offerings like PayPal and Skype could greatly impact how surfers use these platforms. From 2006 to 2007, StumbleUpon showed 150% Year over Year growth. The platform engages users by allowing them to recommend online content. The more recommendations, the higher a website's content will rank in the listings. Users can also rank ads on the websites, giving advertisers an idea of how their ads appeal to the masses. The site boasts nearly 2.3 million users and 5 million daily recommendations. "We think that joining eBay is the right thing to do to help us to grow StumbleUpon to its full potential. We think eBay is a great fit for us because eBay and StumbleUpon share similar approaches – we’re both driven by our community of users, and we are both dedicated to connecting people," mentioned the StumbleUpon blog. Tim Knox and Scott Paton discuss how this could impact your eBay sales. eBay has 100's of millions of buyers and sellers. Are you taking full advantage of this huge, profitable market? Each week Scott Paton and Tim Knox discuss the latest news from the auction capital of the Internet. Whether you are starting out, an experienced Powerseller or just looking to find great deals, eBay Auction Taskforce is your source for success. Length: 15:37

Technorati Tags: ebay, Skype, auction, auctions, collectibles., selling,Scott Paton,Tim Knox.

item.title: Ebay Auctions Taskforce - How to Find JV partners on eBay - Podcast #8
item.description:
In this episode, Tim and Scott discuss how you can find strong joint Venture partners on eBay. eBay has 100's of millions of buyers and sellers. Are you taking full advantage of this huge, profitable market? Each week Scott Paton and Tim Knox discuss the latest news from the auction capital of the Internet. Whether you are starting out, an experienced Powerseller or just looking to find great deals, eBay Auction Taskforce is your source for success. Tim Knox and Dr. Mike are authors of the popular Auction Traffic Mastery. Tim Knox is a veteran entrepreneur, newspaper columnist, radio show host, and eBay expert. Tim became a full-time entrepreneur in 1995 and since 2004 has built a highly successful Internet Marketing business with dozens of products and millions in revenue. His new hard cover book, "Everything I Know About Business I Learned From My Mama" will be published in 2007 by John Wiley & Sons, NY, and his weekly radio show, "The Tim Knox Show" is considered to be one of the top small business advice radio shows on the air (or in the Podcast world). Length: 28:53

Technorati Tags: ebay, Skype, auction, auctions, collectibles., selling,Scott Paton,Tim Knox,Mike Filsaime.
My Odeo Channel (odeo/3ea99400fa18a88f)

item.title: Ebay Taskforce - Dropshipping Secrets Revealed Podcast #3
item.description:
Learn the secrets of successful dropshipping from one of the world's leading authorities on drop shipping, Tim Knox. Tim has taught thousands of eBayers how to use dropshipping to explode their eBay biuisinesses. His site, http://www.dropshipwholesale.net, is The Internet's #1 Source of eBay, Dropship, and Online Business Information.

Warming!

Tim and I recorded this 'live' in Redmond, WA, at an outside cafe after Tim spoke at Focus4theFuture. You will hear cars drive by!

Length: 17:09
